peopleAlsoAsk.title: Appraising Artifacts - San Jacinto Museum

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do you value artifacts?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
It is essential to understand the materials of which the item is composed, such as the type of stone or metal, as well as any distinct features such as carvings or inscriptions. Age is also a factor in determining the value of an object, with items of greater age being more valuable.
Jul 9, 2023
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Appraising Artifacts and Antiquities: Evaluating Historical Finds

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Who appraises Native American artifacts?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Services provided by The Indian Artifact Grading Authority assist clients with establishing the authenticity, value and provenance of their Native American artifacts. Whether you are new to Indian artifacts or a lifelong collector, the IAGA will meet your needs.
